name: Super Dungeon Adventure
description:
Welcome to my entry for the 2022 Gamedev.tv gamejam - "death is only the beginning"!

Take on the role of a brave adventurer, delving into the dungeon of a necromancer!  Search out the treasure, but watch out - it won't be long before the necromancer takes notice of you...

Controls - controller supported, use the left stick to move and the A button to interact, or for keyboard use arrow keys/WASD and space.
